Package com.yinhai.ta404.core.log.logback.appender.kafka.domain.encoding

Class LayoutKafkaMessageEncoder<E>

java.lang.Object
ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAwareBase
com.yinhai.ta404.core.log.logback.appender.kafka.domain.encoding.AbstractKafkaMessageEncoder<E>
com.yinhai.ta404.core.log.logback.appender.kafka.domain.encoding.LayoutKafkaMessageEncoder<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAware, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.LifeCycle, KafkaMessageEncoder<E>
public class LayoutKafkaMessageEncoder<E> extends AbstractKafkaMessageEncoder<E>
A KafkaMessageEncoder that can be configured with a Layout and a Charset and creates a serialized string for each event using the given layout.
Since:
5.0
